mdRecord.dcterms:title: Doepner, Herman J. to Mrs. Franklin D. Roosevelt; 01 of 01
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--LettersItems 28-33Doepner, Herman J. to Mrs. Franklin D. Roosevelt regarding a national defense issue related to women stenographers and their ability of fingerprint identification. Notes handwritten at bottom about sending one to the president, keeping a copy.; 1 page; DF n.a.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fingerprints
Identification
